## How to Start

1. **Install the Gatsby CLI.**

   ```
   npm install -g gatsby-cli

   ```

2. **Create a new Gatsby site with this starter.**

   ```
   gatsby new elevatedInfusions https://github.com/hotpinkpoliticalmatrix/elevatedinfusions
   ```

3. **Start the site in `develop` mode.**

   ```
   cd elevatedInfusions
   gatsby develop
   ```

4. **Open the source code and start editing!**
